Title: Selflessly and respectfully presenting the glory of labor
Publisher: Dongbei caijing daxue chubanshe (东北财经大学出版社)
Notes: Published in September 1989, after the massacre of students, citizens, and other innocent bystanders in Beijing on 3-4 June 1989, in honor of the National model workers.The text top left: 向全国劳动模范和先进工作者致敬 - 1989。北京 (Tribute to the National model workers and advanced workers - 1989 Beijing). On the top bar of the medal: 全国劳动模范 (National model worker).
